==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|もん|とう|む|よう|yomi=on|k2=どう}}

===Etymology===
[[問答]] (''[[mondō]]'', "[[dialogue]]") + [[無用]] (''[[muyō]]'', "[[futility]]" or "[[uselessness]]")

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|もんどうむよう}}

# (there is) no use in arguing; dialogue is useless
#: [[話せばわかる]]。&mdash; '''問答無用'''！
#:: はなせばわかる。&mdash; もんどうむよう！
#:: ''hanaseba wakaru. &mdash; mondōmuyō!''
#:: You'll be convinced if you just listen to me. &mdash; No argument!

[[Category:Yojijukugo|もんとうむよう]]
